just a taste.name: Just a Taste
just a taste.desc: First bloodrend mantra you hit in combat has increased blood drain.

blood transfusion.name: Blood Transfusion
blood transfusion.desc: Successfully landing a critical attack while under a negative status effect will transfer the effect plus recover a small portion of your blood bar. (20 second CD)

open wound.name: Open Wound
open wound.desc: Guardbreaking enemies leaves enemies more susceptible to blood loss from Bloodrend mantras.

blood bag.name: Blood Bag
blood bag.desc: You receive extra blood from knocking an enemy.
